EmailTemplate.name: SGP MRT NCF campaign.Email - Confirmation eDM (Accepted)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your NCF Invite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[#]]> <[[#]]>
SEE THE LIGHT
TASTE THE LIGHT Your official invite to a disruptive drinking experience has arrived.
Venue: XXXXXX
Date: November 25, 2016
Time: XX:XX PM
Flash this invite along with your IC to be one of the elite few to try the new NCF Ice Pool and the NCF Frappe for the first time.
Entry will not be granted to persons not above the legal drinking age of 18 or above.
We reserve the rights to request for a valid photo ID to verify recipient’s age.
We reserve the rights to reject your purchase if you appear intoxicated or are physically or verbally abusive to any of our team members.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
